revision.text: Possibly: The chronology and history of the world. From the Creation to the year of Christ, 1768, illustrated in LVI tables; of which IV are introductory & include the century prior to the I.st Olympiad, and each of the remaining LII contain in one expanded view, 50 years, or half a century / by the Revd. John Blair L.L.D. (London : [s.n.], printed in the year 1768). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1455402~S1
